connector.description: Consume events from an Azure Storage Blob change feed.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.period
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between fetches to the Azure Storage change feed.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob access Key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.clientId
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob client Id.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.clientSecret
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob client secret.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changefeed-source.tenantId
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: The Azure Storage Blob tenant id.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-changef.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt.
